body: @haruyu, Oh I know, but most artists just don't wanna get lynched by the rabid fans of Shirou. Even with FGO moving forward with a different Artoria in LB6, apparently all Artorias belong to Shirou.

@Feed Me, which is stupid, considering OG Saber and FGO "OG" Saber are two different characters. The one who's in love with Shirou is in... alright, I won't spoiler this, even though probably no one who would be bothered by it will see this.
Moreover, Summer Arturia's FA line + the picture are pretty suggestive. It would make for pretty great doujin material.
@Haruyu, because its sacred ground for anyone other than Shirou to touch OG Artoria.

It's such a shame that this is pretty much the only doujin with Arturia in her FGO swimsuit.

I don't even understand why, considering how extremely popular she is.
